languages.text: "Знаешь, Глейто не помешает площадка для ваших тренировок. Я отдам приказ, чтобы в одном из отсеков обустроили место с подобающим снаряжением".
"I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will order a space be prepared in one of the compartments and have it outfitted with everything you need."
languages.original_text: "Знаешь, Глейто не помешает площадка для ваших тренировок. Я отдам приказ, чтобы в одном из отсеков обустроили место с подобающим снаряжением".

traits.locale_text: "I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will have a space prepared in one of the compartments and outfitted with everything you need."
"I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will have a space prepared in one of the compartments and outfitted with everything you need."
"I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will order a space be prepared in one of the compartments and have it outfitted with everything you need."
"I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will order a space be prepared in one of the compartments and have it outfitted with everything you need."
"I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will order a space be prepared in one of the compartments and have it outfitted with everything you need."
"I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will order a space be prepared in one of the compartments and have it outfitted with everything you need."

languages.text: 「君とグライトには、専用の訓練エリアが必要だろう。艦内の一室を用意させて、必要な装備をすべて揃えておこう」
languages.original_text: "I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will order a space be prepared in one of the compartments and have it outfitted with everything you need."

traits.locale_text: 「君とグライトには、専用の訓練エリアが必要だろう。艦内の一室を用意させて、必要な装備をすべて揃えておこう」

languages.text: "Ich denke, Ihr und Glaito könntet einen eigene Trainingsbereich gebrauchen. Ich werde anordnen, dass in einem der Module einer vorbereitet wird und Ihr alles erhaltet, was Ihr dazu benötigt."
languages.original_text: "I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will order a space be prepared in one of the compartments and have it outfitted with everything you need."

traits.locale_text: "Ich denke, Ihr und Glaito könntet einen eigene Trainingsbereich gebrauchen. Ich werde anordnen, dass in einem der Module einer vorbereitet wird und Ihr alles erhaltet, was Ihr dazu benötigt."

languages.text: « Je pense que Glaito et vous devriez avoir votre propre terrain d'entraînement. Je vais vous faire attribuer un compartiment et vous fournir tout ce dont vous avez besoin. »
languages.original_text: "I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will order a space be prepared in one of the compartments and have it outfitted with everything you need."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense que Glaito et vous devriez avoir votre propre terrain d'entraînement. Je vais vous faire attribuer un compartiment et vous fournir tout ce dont vous avez besoin. »

languages.text: «Creo que usted y Glaito necesitan un lugar propio donde entrenarse. Ordenaré que dispongan un espacio en alguno de los compartimentos y lo equipen con todo lo que precisen».
languages.original_text: "I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will order a space be prepared in one of the compartments and have it outfitted with everything you need."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que usted y Glaito necesitan un lugar propio donde entrenarse. Ordenaré que dispongan un espacio en alguno de los compartimentos y lo equipen con todo lo que precisen».

languages.text: “我觉得你和格雷托应该有你们自己的训练场。我马上让我的人给你们准备一个船舱，把你们需要的一切都准备好。”
languages.original_text: "I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will order a space be prepared in one of the compartments and have it outfitted with everything you need."

traits.locale_text: “我觉得你和格雷托应该有你们自己的训练场。我马上让我的人给你们准备一个船舱，把你们需要的一切都准备好。”

languages.text: "Bence ikinize özel bir idman sahanız olsa fena olmaz. Kompartımanlardan birinde boş bir alan hazırlatıp ihtiyacınız olan her şeyle donatılmasını emredeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I think you and Glaito could do with your own training ground. I will order a space be prepared in one of the compartments and have it outfitted with everything you need."

traits.locale_text: "Bence sen ve Glaito'ya özel bir idman sahanız olsa fena olmaz. Kompartımanlardan birinde boş bir alan hazırlatacağım ve ihtiyacınız olan her şeyle donatılmasını emredeceğim."
